name: iCSeeSmart
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
iCSee Smart is an IPC camera, you can securely monitor your home by using APP on smartphone or web on PC.

Now, with the skill iCSee Smart you can play the stream by voice

HOW TO GET CONNECTED:
1. Search the "iCSee Smart" skill on Alexa app
2. Tap the 'Enable' button
3. Enter your iCSee account and password to link your iCSee account
4. Select a camera to bind
5.After your iCSee account has been successfully linked. Talk to your Echo and say, "Alexa, show camera".

TIPS: To use this skill, you need to specify the name and password of the desired camera, which can be found and configured in the iCSee App.

LIST OF COMMANDS:
- Alexa, show camera
